divs: Sighting Details When I was 3 year old,I had my first experience.I remember that I was taken and experimented on. At the time,I didn't no really what was going on.Years later,they came back for me.I was living at the time in the Keys(Key West). When I was taken again for the second time,and experimented on. Then,years went buy again at the time. When I was taken again from Miami,in which Mufon was called and investigation was made. I was given a technology in Geometry and trigonometry,which is base of the universe and life its self. Antigravity:Is cause by a reaction of matter and antimatter. The theory they gave me is base on Ionic Propulsion. To whom it may concern: First of all,I need three enginers,in computer,a robotic and a nuclear .Also, I need the founds for five years work for the expensive and materials to create the object.My endeavor is give that the theory in service to the United State of America,to be use as the development of space travel. Sincerely: Lazaro Parrondo Thank you. The theory they gave me is on Ionic Propulsion
